H0.text: who played the king in the ten commandments. Charlton Heston

H1.text: who played the king in the ten commandments. Vincent Price

H2.text: who played the king in the ten commandments. James Mason

H3.text: who played the king in the ten commandments. Yul Brynner

A4.text: Cecil B. de Mille hired Brynner for The Ten Commandments (1956) to play Ramesses II opposite Charlton Heston after seeing him in the stage version of The King and I, telling Brynner backstage that he was the only person for the role

A5.text: Yul Brynner played Rameses in The Ten Commandments
